## ./pachctl list-branch

Return all branches on a repo.

### Synopsis


Return all branches on a repo.

```
./pachctl list-branch repo-name
```

### Options

```
  -a, --all   list all branches including cancelled and archived ones
```

### Options inherited from parent commands

```
  -v, --verbose   Output verbose logs
```
